sources.title: Stop-over Forever
sources.description: Title: Stop-over Forever Summary: The flight attendant Sue Chambers becomes frightened for her life when she discovers that one of her coworkers was killed because the murderer thought he was killing her. Her fear does not ... Directed by: Frederic Goode Actors: Ann Bell, Anthony Bate, Conrad Phillips Production Company: Associated British-Path√© Release Date: May 1964 (UK) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG The flight attendant Sue Chambers becomes frightened for her life when she discovers that one of her coworkers was killed because the murderer thought he was killing her. Her fear does not prevent Sue from looking into the matter and trying to learn the killer's identity.

metadata.Plot: The flight attendant Sue Chambers becomes frightened for her life when she discovers that one of her coworkers was killed because the murderer thought he was killing her. Her fear does not prevent Sue from looking into the matter and trying to learn the killer's identity.
metadata.Actors: Ann Bell, Anthony Bate, Conrad Phillips
